name: PlateCalculator
0:
”Alexa, open Plate Calculator.”
”Alexa, start Plate Calculator.”
”Alexa, run Plate Calculator.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plate calculator
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You tell Plate Calculator the weight you want to lift.
Plate Calculator tells you what plates to put on the bar.

User: Alexa, open plate calculator.
Alexa: Welcome to plate calculator. How much weight do you want to lift?
User: two hundred twenty
Alexa: To lift 220 pounds, load the following on each side, 1, 45 pound plate, 1, 35 pound plate, 1, 5 pound plate, and 1, 2.5 pound plate.

If you don't want Alexa to ask you for the weight you want to lift:
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for two hundred twenty.
Alexa: To lift 220 pounds, load the following on each side, 1, 45 pound plate, 1, 35 pound plate, 1, 5 pound plate, and 1, 2.5 pound plate.

If you need Alexa to repeat the last thing said:
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for repeat.
Alexa will then repeat the last thing said.

If you need help using plate calculator:
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for help.
Alexa will tell you the commands you can say when using plate calculator.
The list of commands Alexa will speak is long.
You can stop Alexa at any point by saying: Alexa, [one of the commands you have heard].
Example of how to stop Alexa while listening to the list of commands:
User: Alexa, bar weight.
Alexa will then tell you how much the bar weighs.

-- SUMMARY OF THINGS YOU CAN SAY:
Alexa, open plate calculator.
Alexa, open plate calculator for [weight you want to lift].
Alexa, open plate calculator for [percentage] percent of [weight].
Alexa, open plate calculator for repeat.
Alexa, open plate calculator for help.
Alexa, open plate calculator for pounds.
Alexa, open plate calculator for kilograms.
Alexa, open plate calculator for unit of measure.
Alexa, open plate calculator for bar weight.
Alexa, open plate calculator for collar weight.
Alexa, open plate calculator for plates.
Alexa, open plate calculator for rounding.
Alexa, open plate calculator for cancel subscription.

-- POUNDS or KILOGRAMS
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for pounds.
Alexa: Unit of measure is pounds.

User: Alexa, open plate calculator for kilograms.
Alexa: Unit of measure has changed from pounds to kilograms.

-- BAR WEIGHT
Default bar weight in pounds is 45.
Default bar weight in kilograms is 20.
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for bar weight.
Alexa: Bar weight is 45 pounds. Do you want to change bar weight?
To change bar weight see: -- PLATE CALCULATOR PLUS below.

-- COLLAR WEIGHT
Default collar weight in pounds and kilograms is 0.
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for collar weight.
Alexa: Each collar weighs 0 pounds. Would you like to change collar weight?
To change collar weight see: -- PLATE CALCULATOR PLUS below.

-- PLATES
Default plates in pounds are: 45, 35, 25, 10, 5, 2.5. 
Default plates in kilograms are: 20, 15, 10, 5, 2.5, 1.25
To change plates see: -- PLATE CALCULATOR PLUS below.

-- ROUNDING
User: Alexa, open plate calculator for rounding.
Alexa: Rounding is down. Do you want to change rounding to up?
User: yes
Alexa: Rounding has changed from down to up.

Rounding happens when no plate combinations equal the weight you want to lift.
Example:
The weight you want to lift is 137 pounds.
If rounding is down, 137 pounds rounds down to 135 pounds. 
If rounding is up, 137 pounds rounds up to 140 pounds.

-- PLATE CALCULATOR PLUS
If you want to change any of these:

Bar weight
Collar weight
Plates

You need a subscription to Plate Calculator Plus.

Please go to the following link for Comments, Questions or if you need more information: https://adelgrenllc.com/platecalc.html
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
